about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the Python bindings of the LALPulsar C libraries
and additional Python modules.

Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.
All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are
part of the `lalpulsar` package.
about.summary: LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library Python libraries

name: python-lalpulsar
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.9
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: python-lalpulsar
  version: 4.0.0
source:
  sha256: c6e6d07c49f6444dfb36a4679ec4a03b5fab2b705e689f7ef7eff4eb802d9120
  url: https://software.igwn.org/sources/source/lalsuite/lalpulsar-4.0.0.tar.xz
build:
  error_overdepending: true
  error_overlinking: true
  ignore_run_exports:
    - numpy
    - python
  number: 2
  string: py37h4de8ad1_2
requirements:
  build:
    - ca-certificates 2022.5.18.1 h033912b_0
    - cctools_osx-64 973.0.1 h3eff9a4_10
    - clang 13.0.1 h694c41f_0
    - clang-13 13.0.1 default_he082bbe_0
    - clang_osx-64 13.0.1 h71a8856_2
    - clangxx 13.0.1 default_he082bbe_0
    - compiler-rt 13.0.1 he01351e_0
    - compiler-rt_osx-64 13.0.1 hd3f61c9_0
    - help2man 1.49.2 pl5321h5eb16cf_0
    - ld64_osx-64 609 h6fbe7a8_10
    - libclang-cpp13 13.0.1 default_he082bbe_0
    - libcxx 14.0.5 hce7ea42_1
    - libiconv 1.16 haf1e3a3_0
    - libllvm13 13.0.1 h64f94b2_2
    - libzlib 1.2.12 h6c3fc93_0
    - llvm-tools 13.0.1 h64f94b2_2
    - make 4.3 h22f3db7_1
    - openssl 3.0.3 hfe4f2af_0
    - pcre 8.45 he49afe7_0
    - perl 5.32.1 2_h0d85af4_perl5
    - pkg-config 0.29.2 ha3d46e9_1008
    - sigtool 0.1.3 h88f4db0_0
    - swig 4.0.2 hce5123c_2
    - tapi 1100.0.11 h9ce4665_0
  host:
    - ca-certificates 2022.5.18.1 h033912b_0
    - libblas 3.9.0 15_osx64_openblas
    - libcblas 3.9.0 15_osx64_openblas
    - libcxx 14.0.5 hce7ea42_1
    - libffi 3.4.2 h0d85af4_5
    - libgfortran 5.0.0 9_3_0_h6c81a4c_23
    - libgfortran5 9.3.0 h6c81a4c_23
    - liblalpulsar 4.0.0 h45b5eec_2
    - liblapack 3.9.0 15_osx64_openblas
    - libopenblas 0.3.20 openmp_hb3cd9ec_0
    - libzlib 1.2.12 h6c3fc93_0
    - llvm-openmp 14.0.4 ha654fa7_0
    - ncurses 6.3 h96cf925_1
    - numpy 1.19.5 py37hdb226fd_3
    - openssl 3.0.3 hfe4f2af_0
    - python 3.7.12 hf3644f1_100_cpython
    - python_abi 3.7 2_cp37m
    - readline 8.1.2 h3899abd_0
    - sqlite 3.38.5 hd9f0692_0
    - tk 8.6.12 h5dbffcc_0
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.12 h6c3fc93_0
  run:
    - astropy
    - liblalpulsar 4.0.0 h45b5eec_2
    - numpy >=1.19.5,<2.0a0
    - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0
    - python-lal >=7.1.5
    - python-lalframe >=2.0.0
    - python_abi 3.7.* *_cp37m
    - six
test:
  commands:
    - LAL_TEST_PKGDATADIR="./lib" python -m pytest -ra -v test/python
  imports:
    - lalpulsar
    - lalpulsar.NstarTools
    - lalpulsar.PulsarParametersWrapper
    - lalpulsar.simulateCW
  requires:
    - pytest >=4.0.0a0
  source_files:
    - lib/*.dat.gz
    - test/python
about:
  description: 'The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

    This package contains the Python bindings of the LALPulsar C libraries

    and additional Python modules.


    Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.

    All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are

    part of the `lalpulsar` package.

    '
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite.git
  doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalpulsar/
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library Python libraries
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: lalpulsar
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - skymoo

Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.
